## Checklist: Visit-Level Regulatory Review (CRA)
- [ ] Current IRB approval present and not expired/lapsed
- [ ] Correct ICF version in use; documentation complete
- [ ] DOA covers staff performing trial tasks; dates aligned
- [ ] Training evidence documented for key systems/processes
- [ ] Essential documents filed and reconciled (site/TMF)
- [ ] Open regulatory issues tracked with due dates
